quote_last: He sighed and asked the receptionist if he could use the washroom.
title: Sons of Fortune
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: Katelyn stood in the hallway, her hands on her hips, enjoying the hell out of the moment. “So I see how it is,” she said. “Your cousin can visit during finals week but my sister can’t.”
title: Kitchens of the Great Midwest
author: J. Ryan Stradal
